content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### ERROR TIPS
- No iron plates found in inventory
 - Ensure you have iron plates in your inventory before attempting actions that require them.
- No iron ore found in inventory
 - Ensure you have iron ore in your inventory before attempting actions that require them.
- Found wood in inventory
 - Ensure you do not have wood in your inventory when attempting actions that require other items.
- Found coal in inventory
 - Ensure you do not have coal in your inventory when attempting actions that require other items.

### NAMESPACE
